title: Professional Communication Competency Enhancement Program Using Biblical and Theological English (EBT)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of theology and biblical studies, plus intermediate+ English reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Interdisciplinary Communication Competency Emphasis Between Theology and Science for Learners with Scientific Research Methodology Backgrounds

learning_goals: Capable of accurately interpreting academic texts using 500 specialized English terms related to the Bible and theology.
Able to deliver a 15-minute oral presentation linking theological concepts to scientific discourse.
Application of theological English writing styles considering cultural differences (submission of three essays).
Leading interdisciplinary discussions applying EBT principles (conducting two team-based projects)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
